mapper.select: select id, pg_data, pg_name from j_waybill where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into j_waybill(id, pg_data, pg_name) values(#{id}, #{data, typeHandler=com.apl.postgres.demo.utils.JsonTypeHandlerPg}, #{name});
mapper.update: update j_waybill set pg_name = #{name}, pg_data = #{data, typeHandler=com.apl.postgres.demo.utils.JsonTypeHandlerPg} where id = #{id};
